price: 53. Cuando muramos y seamos polvo y huesos, ¿rendiremos cuentas de nuestras acciones?’”.
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban waʿiẓāman a-innā lamadīnūna
